Reviews.Title: Great picture.but......
Reviews.Author: Henry Bennett
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and color however sound quality is marginal.3d works great but supplied 3d glasses would not hold a charge so I had to keep connected into charger to view the 3d feature.Overall on the most important feature of picture quality this is an exception buy.

Reviews.Title: bad shipping bad service white blemishes on tv open box while shipping than it gets stole with in 3 weeks
Reviews.Author: Brigel
Reviews.Content: i receive the tv  last month on December 13, 2014 it took a while i have to go cross town to pick it up once i pick it up at a warehouse in the middle of nowhere i sign for it noticing the box was opened i finally put it in my house turn on the tv and noticeing white blemishes on the tv thinking that it got hit by the carriers during shipment process i was mad and very disappointed the fact of buy a tv online and just haveing it for 3 weeks it end up being stolen  just so you know someone pick lock my locks brakeing in to my apartment  then me coming home going in my room and its gone i immediately reported to police and reported stolen its been very stressful for me not having a tv to watch and doing that hard work paying you guys for a nice tv for nothing

ProductInfo.Features:
Resolution: 1080p
Refresh Rate: 120Hz in 3D
Smart TV: Netflix, Youtube, Vudu HD Movies and VUDU Apps with WIFI
3D Glasses: 2 pairs Included
Built in Wi-Fi
ProductInfo.Name: 55" Hitachi Ultravision LED 1080p 120Hz 3D TV
